page.title: 17Road Accident in St. Albans
page.content: I knew a girl called Hakima. She died on Tuesday May 21st 1985, on Hatfield Road. She had just come out of school. Her friends saw the accident. They went to get her sister. I came to know about it because my Dad came home and told my Mum. Then my Mum went to see her Mum. She did not come back until the next morning. Every night my Mum went to see her. I did not cry, but my Mum did. I don't know why I did not cry. A truck had knocked her over and she fell on the ground. It happened on Hatfield Road. It's a busy road. I have seen lots of cars and lorries there.
